/*NEDMBUY0030.TSC_PRODUCT-SELECT01*/ SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BUY_DY,'yyyymmdd'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BUY_DY , PROD_CD , PROD_NM , PROD_STD , ORD_IPSU , (SELECT SUBSTR(CD_NM, 1, 10) FROM TPC_CODE WHERE MAJOR_CD = 'CSA01' AND MINOR_CD = A.ORD_UNIT) AS DANWI , (SELECT CD_NM FROM TPC_CODE WHERE MAJOR_CD = 'SPP01' AND MINOR_CD = A.BUY_RTN_FG) AS BUY_RTN_NM , NVL(SUM(TOT_QTY), 0) AS TOT_QTY , NVL(SUM(TOT_PRC), 0) AS TOT_PRC , NVL(SUM(BUY_BOX_QTY), 0) AS BUY_BOX_QTY , NVL(SUM(BUY_QTY), 0) AS BUY_QTY , NVL(SUM(BUY_BUY_AMT), 0) AS BUY_BUY_PRC FROM ( SELECT A.ORD_SLIP_NO , A.PROD_CD , A.PROD_NM , A.PROD_STD , A.ORD_UNIT , A.ORD_IPSU , A.BUY_DY , A.BUY_RTN_FG , A.BUY_QTY , (B.ORD_QTY) AS TOT_QTY , (B.BUY_PRC) AS TOT_PRC , A.BUY_BOX_QTY , A.BUY_BUY_AMT FROM (
SELECT /*+ ordered use_nl(a b) index(a IX_PC_STR_BUY_03)*/ A.BUY_DY AS BUY_DY , A.STR_CD AS STR_CD , A.ORD_SLIP_NO AS ORD_SLIP_NO , B.PROD_CD AS PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM AS PROD_NM , B.PROD_STD AS PROD_STD , B.ORD_UNIT AS ORD_UNIT , B.ORD_IPSU AS ORD_IPSU , A.BUY_RTN_FG AS BUY_RTN_FG , B.BUY_QTY AS BUY_QTY , B.BUY_BOX_QTY AS BUY_BOX_QTY , B.BUY_BUY_AMT AS BUY_BUY_AMT FROM TPC_STR_BUY A INNER JOIN TPC_STR_BUY_PROD B ON A.BUY_SLIP_NO = B.BUY_SLIP_NO AND A.YYYY = B.YYYY WHERE A.BUY_DY BETWEEN replace(#srchStartDate#,'-','') and replace(#srchEndDate#,'-','')
#venCds[]#
A.VEN_CD = #srchEntpCode#
#srchStoreVal[]#
B.PROD_CD = #srchProductVal#
A.BUY_RTN_FG = #srchBuying#
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TPC_ORD_PROD B ON A.ORD_SLIP_NO = B.ORD_SLIP_NO AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD ) A GROUP BY BUY_DY, PROD_CD, PROD_NM, PROD_STD, ORD_IPSU, A.ORD_UNIT, BUY_RTN_FG ORDER BY BUY_DY
